sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Best Practice">15e680be1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcb86</category> <github_id>27</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/27</github_url> <message>For completed update set on the production instance, you should always change the state to Ignore. This state ensures that the update set is not committed again when cloning the instance.  Credits: Garrison Ball</message> <number>TIL0001020</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-05-16 15:55:49</sys_created_on> <sys_id>23c4133d1b3894108ed631d7dc4bcb1b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-03 05:52:37</sys_updated_on> <title>Updateset Best Practice</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
